Name: Emoji Merge - Puzzle Matching
About the game: Merge the Cat emojis and clear all the levels! Beautiful merging game with Cat emojis, to test your IQ ;) Connect at least 2 neighboring emojis to pop them The game is very intuitive and cute. The game is very intuitive, cute, and it contains a tutorial system to help beginner players understand the game. There are 3 different powerups: Add Emojis - Adds a row of emojis Bomb - pops every neighboring emojis Sword - select the desired emoji to pop Feature: - Simple but exciting - Suitable for all ages - Train your brain to be smarter - Test your IQ - Each level is carefully designed
